amendment.description: To provide American jobs through economic growth.

vote.text: Amendment SA 928, under the order of 11/8/2011, not having achieved 60 votes in the affirmative, was not agreed to in Senate by Yea-Nay Vote. 40 - 56. Record Vote Number: 202.

action.text: Amendment SA 928 proposed by Senator McCain to Amendment SA 927. (consideration: CR S7267-7268) To provide American jobs through economic growth.

Roll call votes on amendments in Senate: Amendment SA 928, under the order of 11/8/2011, not having achieved 60 votes in the affirmative, was not agreed to in Senate by Yea-Nay Vote. 40 - 56. Record Vote Number: 202.

Senate amendment not agreed to: Amendment SA 928, under the order of 11/8/2011, not having achieved 60 votes in the affirmative, was not agreed to in Senate by Yea-Nay Vote. 40 - 56. Record Vote Number: 202.
Senate amendment proposed (on the floor): Amendment SA 928 proposed by Senator McCain to Amendment SA 927.
